default: Oxi: Yeah, I got it... talk to me later. Youd be surprised by what I can find.
Oxi: Dont run your mouth about this. Just buy and leave.
Oxi: Werent you just here? Buy what you need, I guess.
quest_greet_the_town: Oxi: Can't sleep? I might have something for that. Come find me at night.
quest_mysterious_note_1: Oxi: Hey! Don't just wave the arcane around like that.
quest_mysterious_note_2: Oxi: Yeah, I've seen it before. Come find me later tonight.
quest_mysterious_note_3: Oxi: Look, if you want to know more, you have to try some drugs.
